title: Introducing: Doji
content:
Listening to Doji almost feels like a bit of a throwback to ‘old’ Bon Iver, such has Vernon’s sound morphed over the course of his career.

Hailing from LA, his influences seemingly span the likes of the aforementioned Bon Iver, Peter Gabriel, The Japanese House and even elements of The 1975 to his single Foreign Fields, released earlier this year. Encouragingly, it’s his latest offering, Blue, that feels the most complete and progressive of his tracks thus far – delicate yet beautifully reassured. Check it out below.
